page.title: 08HOBBIES AND PASTIMES
page.content: By L.Clements and A. Filby aged 10 One of my hobbies is collecting rubbers or pencil erasers. They come in all shapes and sizes and sometimes they smell just like the objects they are supposed to be. I have been collecting rubbers for nearly a year and I have got 85 altogether. When I was small I used to play games like 'Orange Balls' which is where a group of children stand in a circle holding hands. Then they skip round singing. The last to sit down is out and so on. The words they sing are:Orange Balls, Orange Balls, Here we go again, The last one to sit down is out. Another game I played when I was smaller was called 'Mr. Wolf.' When you play Mr. Wolf one person is on and you stand far away from him or her and you have to say "What's the time Mr. Wolf?"
